pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 253 MB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: This is the originally HUCAST 4 CD-Box containing the soundtrack of DUX, DUX 1.5, the EXTRA-CD and REDUX: DARK MATTERS, composed by Andre Neuman feat. Chris Huelsbeck
